languages.text: "Откуда вы это взяли? Да, порой я устраиваю публичные казни для своего узкого круга друзей... погодите, я помню, как моя конфидантка просила у меня дозволения воспользоваться салоном для некоего собрания. Я сочла, что речь идет о идеологических прениях, а не жертвоприношении!"

traits.locale_text: "Откуда вы это взяли? Да, порой я устраиваю публичные казни для своего узкого круга друзей... погодите, я помню, как моя конфидантка просила у меня дозволения воспользоваться салоном для некоего собрания. Я сочла, что речь идет о идеологических прениях, а не жертвоприношении!"

languages.text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"
languages.original_text: "Откуда вы это взяли? Да, порой я устраиваю публичные казни для своего узкого круга друзей... погодите, я помню, как моя конфидантка просила у меня дозволения воспользоваться салоном для некоего собрания. Я сочла, что речь идет о идеологических прениях, а не жертвоприношении!"

traits.locale_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

"Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

"Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

"Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

languages.text: “您是从哪里听说这件事情的？没错，我确实会时不时地为一小群朋友举行死刑表演……等等，我想起来了。我的女官确实征求过我的许可，要求借用会客室举行聚会之类的。我以为她是要和她的朋友们讨论意识形态，没想到她会搞什么献祭仪式！”
languages.original_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

traits.locale_text: “您是从哪里听说这件事情的？没错，我确实会时不时地为一小群朋友举行死刑表演……等等，我想起来了。我的女官确实征求过我的许可，要求借用会客室举行聚会之类的。我以为她是要和她的朋友们讨论意识形态，没想到她会搞什么献祭仪式！”

languages.text: «¿Dónde ha oído eso? Sí, es cierto que ocasionalmente organizo ejecuciones para un pequeño círculo de amistades... Un momento, recuerdo que una de mis confidentes me pidió permiso para usar el salón para una reunión. ¡Pensaba que quería organizar un debate, no un sacrificio!».
languages.original_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Dónde ha oído eso? Sí, es cierto que ocasionalmente organizo ejecuciones para un pequeño círculo de amistades... Un momento, recuerdo que una de mis confidentes me pidió permiso para usar el salón para una reunión. ¡Pensaba que quería organizar un debate, no un sacrificio!».

languages.text: 「どちらでそれを？ええ、たしかに時々は、ごく親しい友人のために死刑を執行しますが…お待ちください。何かの集まりで使える広間を探していた友人がいたはずです。思想的議論をするためで、生け贄にするためではありません！」
languages.original_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

traits.locale_text: 「どちらでそれを？ええ、たしかに時々は、ごく親しい友人のために死刑を執行しますが…お待ちください。何かの集まりで使える広間を探していた友人がいたはずです。思想的議論をするためで、生け贄にするためではありません！」

languages.text: "Wo habt Ihr das gehört? Ja, es stimmt, dass ich hin und wieder in kleinen Freundeskreis Hinrichtungen veranstalte ... Moment, ich erinnere mich, dass meine Vertraute um Erlaubnis ersuchte, den Salon für eine Versammlung zu nutzen. Ich dachte, es ginge um ideologische Diskussionen, nicht um Opfer!"
languages.original_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

traits.locale_text: "Wo habt Ihr das gehört? Ja, es stimmt, dass ich hin und wieder in kleinen Freundeskreis Hinrichtungen veranstalte ... Moment, ich erinnere mich, dass meine Vertraute um Erlaubnis ersuchte, den Salon für eine Versammlung zu nutzen. Ich dachte, es ginge um ideologische Diskussionen, nicht um Opfer!"

languages.text: « Qui vous a raconté ça ? Il est vrai que j'organise parfois des exécutions pour un cercle restreint d'amis... Attendez, je me rappelle que ma confidente m'a demandé la permission d'utiliser le salon pour une réunion, sans me donner plus de détails. Je pensais qu'elle parlait d'un échange idéologique, pas d'un sacrifice ! »
languages.original_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

traits.locale_text: « Qui vous a raconté ça ? Il est vrai que j'organise parfois des exécutions pour un cercle restreint d'amis... Attendez, je me rappelle que ma confidente m'a demandé la permission d'utiliser le salon pour une réunion, sans me donner plus de détails. Je pensais qu'elle parlait d'un échange idéologique, pas d'un sacrifice ! »

languages.text: "Kim söyledi bunu? Evet, ara ara arkadaş çevremi eğlendirmek için infaz düzenlediğim doğrudur... Bir saniye. Sırdaşım, salonda toplantı düzenlemek için izin istemişti. Düşünsel bir tartışma yapacaklar sanıyordum, kurban ayini değil!"
languages.original_text: "Where did you hear that? Yes, it's true that from time to time I put on executions for a small circle of friends... Wait, I recall my confidante seeking permission to use the salon for some gathering or other. I thought she meant ideological discussions, not sacrifices!"

traits.locale_text: "Kim söyledi bunu? Evet, ara ara arkadaş çevremi eğlendirmek için infaz düzenlediğim doğrudur... Bir saniye. Sırdaşım, salonda toplantı düzenlemek için izin istemişti. Düşünsel bir tartışma yapacaklar sanıyordum, kurban ayini değil!"
